#include <stdio.h>
#define ll long long
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define md 1000000007
inline void inp(int &n) {
    register int c = gc(); n=0; while(c < '0' || c > '9')c = gc();
    while(c >= '0' && c <= '9') {n = (n << 3) + (n << 1) + c - '0'; c = gc();}
}
inline void inps(char *s){
    register char c; register int i = 0; while((c = gc()) == '\n' || c == ' '); 
    while(c != '\n' && c!=' ' && (int)c != EOF) {s[i++] = c; c = gc();} s[i] = '\0';
}
int main() {
	int t,k,i,c,d;
    inp(t);
    while(t--){
	    char num[105];
        inps(num);	
	    inp(k);
	    c=0;
	    for(i=0;num[i];i++){
	   	    d=c*10+num[i]-'0';
	   	    c=d%k;   	
	    }
	    if(c==0) printf("YES\n");
	    else printf("NO\n");
	}
    return 0;
}
